name: Ghost Plane
description:
You play as a wizard in a tile based world trying to reach the goal whilst avoiding invisible ghosts. Reach the magic fire without running into any ghosts. Ghosts only move when you move, but they remain invisible as soon as you start moving. Beat all 10 levels to get the full story!

Ghost Plane is a game I made for a friendly jam I did with some friends. We call it the Friends Jam and this was our first one. The theme was Hidden World.

Art by Kenney
